description: Detects creation of a scheduled task with a GUID like name
false_positives: Legitimate software naming their tasks as GUIDs
name: Suspicious Scheduled Task Name As GUID
query: (process.executable.text:*\\schtasks.exe AND process.command_line.text:*\/Create\ * AND process.command_line.text:(*\/TN\ \"\{* OR *\/TN\ '\{* OR *\/TN\ \{*) AND process.command_line.text:(*\}\"* OR *\}'* OR *\}\ *))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
